Class.name: UrlPager
Class.summary: Custom paging control for asp.net webform application, It supports url routing and paging through url parameter.

Class.name: RouteValuesExpressionBuilder
Class.summary: Retrieves the route values that corresponds to a specified URL parameter in a routed page.

Property.name: RouteName
Property.summary: Gets or sets the name of the route that is used to generate paging urls.

Property.name: ContainerTag
Property.summary: Gets or sets the HTML tag name for the container element of the pager.

Property.name: RouteValues
Property.summary: The route values to be applied to the route.

Property.name: InheritsRouteValues
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether UrlPager should inherit the route values from the current http context.

Property.name: TotalItemCount
Property.summary: Gets or sets the total number of records that are available for paging.

Property.name: PageSize
Property.summary: Gets or sets the number of records that are displayed for each page of data.

Property.name: AutoHide
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether UrlPager should be hidden if there's only one page of data.

Property.name: PageIndexParameterName
Property.summary: Gets or sets the page index parameter name in the current route.

Property.name: PageNumberFormatString
Property.summary: Gets or sets the format string for all numeric pager items.

Property.name: PagerItemTemplate
Property.summary: Gets or sets the html template to be applied to all pager items.

Property.name: CurrentPageNumberFormatString
Property.summary: Gets or sets the format string for the current page number.

Property.name: NumericPagerItemTemplate
Property.summary: Gets or sets the html template for the numeric pager items.

Property.name: CurrentPagerItemTemplate
Property.summary: Gets or sets the html template to be applied to the current page pager item.

Property.name: NavigationPagerItemTemplate
Property.summary: Gets or sets the html template to be applied to the first, previous, next and last page pager items.

Property.name: DisabledPagerItemTemplate
Property.summary: Gets or sets the html template to be applied to the disabled pager items.

Property.name: MorePagerItemTemplate
Property.summary: Gets or sets the html template to be applied to the more pager items.

Property.name: AlwaysShowFirstLastPageNumber
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the first and the last numeric pager items should be displaye.

Property.name: NumericPagerItemCount
Property.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of the numeric pager items to be displayed.

Property.name: ShowPrevNext
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the previous page and the next page pager items should be displayed.

Property.name: PrevPageText
Property.summary: Gets or sets the text displayed for the previous page pager item.

Property.name: NextPageText
Property.summary: Gets or sets the text displayed for the next page pager item.

Property.name: ShowNumericPagerItems
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the numeric pager items should be displayed.

Property.name: ShowFirstLast
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the first page and the last page pager items should be displayed.

Property.name: FirstPageText
Property.summary: Gets or sets the text displayed for the first page button.

Property.name: LastPageText
Property.summary: Gets or sets the text displayed for the last page pager item.

Property.name: ShowMorePagerItems
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the more pager items should be displayed.

Property.name: MorePageText
Property.summary: Gets or sets the text displayed for the more pager items.

Property.name: ShowDisabledPagerItems
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the disabled pager items should be displayed.

Property.name: ReversePageIndex
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether page index in the url should be reversed, that means the last page index will be 1 while the current page index is the total page number.

Property.name: CurrentPageIndex
Property.summary: Gets or sets the current page index.

Property.name: StartItemIndex
Property.summary: Gets the index of the first data item that is displayed on the current page.

Property.name: EndItemIndex
Property.summary: Gets the index of the last data item that is displayed on the current page.

Property.name: TotalPageCount
Property.summary: Gets the total number of pages.

Event.name: PageChanged
Event.summary: Occurs when one of the pager buttons is clicked, but after the control handles the paging operation.
